column5: This unusual Industrial Park located in a residential neighborhood in Barcelona is guarded by a giant steel dragon sculpture that doubles as a slide.
column6: A former steam-powered mill from the 1800s is now an industrial park with a giant steel dragon slide.
column7: ["'Dona i Ocell' ('Woman and Bird')", 'Las Arenas de Barcelona', 'Priapus of Hostafrancs']
